description.value:
A giant gains additional abilities based on its subspecies.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.hUmxQJtU0bFVSvQQ]{Fire Giant}

Fire giants have fire resistance 5, which stacks with one other source of fire resistance. When wearing armor, their armor check penalty is 1 less severe than normal, and any speed adjustment from the armor is reduced by 5 feet (minimum –0 feet).

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.6Hkxe9THcyi9K2oz]{Hill Giant}

Hill giants gain a +2 species bonus to bull rush and grapple combat maneuvers, and they gain a +2 species bonus to AC against bull rush and grapple combat maneuvers.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.Bqo6LHw6Q1QlWVsH]{Slag Giant}

Slag giants have fire resistance 5, which stacks with one other source of fire resistance. They gain a +2 species bonus to sunder combat maneuvers and ignore 5 points of an object’s hardness when dealing damage.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.zzCYvbd213SjwD5C]{Stone Giant}

Stone giants gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet, and they increase the die size of damage dealt by debris they hurl from d6s to d8s.
